imput_geno.bim = pd.concat([imput_geno.bim[:5],imput_geno.bim[-5:]])

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gn = imput_geno.bed.compute()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def a1freq(d):
    a1,tol = 0.0,0.0
    try:
        a1 = d[2]*2
        tol = d[2]*2
    except:
        print('no 2')
    try:
        a1 += d[1]
        tol += d[1]*2
    except:
        print('no 1')
    try:
        tol += d[0]*2
    except:
        print('no 0')
    return a1/tol
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
bim = imput_geno.bim.copy()
bim['A1freq'] = [a1freq(pd.Series(gn[i,:]).value_counts()) for i in range(10)]
